name: Zombie Runner
description:
Zombies and their love of eating brains has long been a classic theme. For the sake of a couple of three more brains, zombies are ready for a lot. But are they ready for a whole marathon?

Zombie runner - 3D runner with a third-person view in which you have to control one of the undead. Run as far as possible while collecting as many brains as possible. Beat your own records on the way to perfection and prove to everyone that you are the most persistent zombie of all!


Game Features:
- Visual style
- 3D World
- Difficulty
